original_title: Direct flights between Seychelles, Colombo begin tomorrow
original_body_lines: Air Seychelles will launch direct flights between the Republic of Seychelles and Colombo from tomorrow, the Airport and Aviation Services (Sri Lanka) (Private) Limited (AASL) said.
They said the direct flight service is scheduled to operate twice weekly with a duration of 4.15 hours.

Accordingly, the flights will operate from Colombo to Seychelles (HM263) on Wednesdays and Sundays (04.50 departure and 07.35 arrival) and flights from Seychelles to Colombo (HM262) will operate on Tuesdays and Saturdays (22.05 arrival and 03.50 departure) weekely. (Chaturanga Pradeep Samarawickrama)
